long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help developers to search and collect resource, super easy to use

快速搜尋 Stack Overflow

讓你方便記錄喜歡的 Stack Overflow 回答

超好用的書籤功能

整理開發記錄時可以省去很多搜尋的時間

方便的預覽和匯出功能，開發的時候可以更有效率～

Features & characteristics:

Show your likes on new tab
Hide it when you are tired
Easy to delete notes
Preview notes
Usage

Go to chrome app store
Install Stackoverflow-Likes
Go to Stack Oveflow
Like buttons will appear
Enjoy it
